games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- — LaMelo Ball hit seven first-half 3-pointers in his return from a right ankle injury, Charlotte had 18 in the opening 24 minutes to match the NBA and franchise records and the Hornets beat the Atlanta Hawks 133-126 on Thursday night.

Jalen Brunson made a go-ahead 3-pointer with 4.4 seconds left and scored 25 points, OG Anunoby stole the ensuing inbounds pass and the New York Knicks rallied for a 114-113 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Thursday night. Brunson also had seven rebounds and seven assists as the Knicks extended their winning streak to seven games.
blurbs: 📋 Quenton Jackson (IND) made just his 4th start this season. 10 pts, 4 reb.
🆕 Mohamed Diawara (NY) made his first start of the season. 19 min, 5 pts.
📋 Ariel Hukporti (NY) made just his 3rd start this season. 4 pts, 5 reb.
⬆️ Tyler Kolek (NY) played 26 min (season avg: 11). 16 pts, 6 reb, 11 ast.

games.summary: Norman Powell scored 24 points, Kel’el Ware had 22 points, 12 rebounds and four blocks, and the Miami Heat snapped a five-game losing streak with a 106-95 victory over the Brooklyn Nets on Thursday night. scored 28 points for the Nets, who went cold after equaling the most lopsided victory in franchise history in their last game.

Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 32 points before resting in the fourth quarter, and the Oklahoma City Thunder bounced back from a rare loss to beat the Los Angeles Clippers 122-101 on Thursday night. It was his 98th consecutive game with at least 20 points, adding to the second-longest streak in NBA history.
blurbs: 📋 Bogdan Bogdanovic (LAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 14 pts, 2 reb.
⬆️ Kobe Sanders (LAC) played 30 min (season avg: 19). 5 pts, 4 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: San Antonio rookie Dylan Harper had a season-high 24 points and the Spurs led for all but 22 seconds in defeating the Washington Wizards 119-94 on Thursday night to rebound from a disappointing loss in the NBA Cup final. Wembanyama blocked a layup from fellow French center Alex Sarr in the second quarter to extend his streak to 99 consecutive games with a block.
Brandon Ingram scored 29 points, Scottie Barnes added 24 and the Toronto Raptors beat the slumping Milwaukee Bucks 111-105 on Thursday night. Bobby Portis scored 24 points, Kevin Porter Jr .
blurbs: 📋 Jericho Sims (MIL) made just his 4th start this season. 6 pts, 7 reb.
⬆️ Bobby Portis (MIL) played 39 min (season avg: 22). 24 pts, 12 reb, 0 ast.
📋 Sandro Mamukelashvili (TOR) made just his 3rd start this season. 18 pts, 7 reb.
📋 Ochai Agbaji (TOR) made just his 4th start this season. 10 pts, 2 reb.

games.summary: Saddiq Bey scored 21 of his season-high 29 points after halftime, and the New Orleans Pelicans overcame a 25-point, third-quarter deficit to beat the Houston Rockets 133-128 in overtime on Thursday night.

Cooper Flagg had 23 points and 10 rebounds, Anthony Davis added 15 points and the Dallas Mavericks recovered to beat the Detroit Pistons 116-114 in overtime Thursday night after blowing an 18-point third-quarter lead. Cade Cunningham had 29 points, 10 rebounds and 10 assists for his third triple-double this season for the East-leading Pistons (21-6), who have gone 6-4 following a 15-2 start.

Nikola Jokic had 23 points, 13 assists and 11 rebounds to become the career assists leader among centers, and the streaking Denver Nuggets beat the Orlando Magic 126-115 on Thursday night. Jamal Murray scored 20 of his 32 points in a game-turning second quarter for Denver, which won its sixth straight.
blurbs: 🆕 Bruce Brown (DEN) made his first start of the season. 34 min, 11 pts.
⬆️ Jalen Pickett (DEN) played 24 min (season avg: 9). 9 pts, 3 reb, 7 ast.
📋 Tyus Jones (ORL) made just his 2nd start this season. 5 pts, 0 reb.
⬆️ Jett Howard (ORL) played 29 min (season avg: 11). 12 pts, 6 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Jase Richardson (ORL) played 19 min (season avg: 7). 9 pts, 1 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Jordan Goodwin made the go-ahead free throw with 0.4 seconds left, Devin Booker scored 23 of his 25 points in the second half and the Phoenix Suns escaped with a 99-98 victory over the Golden State Warriors on Thursday night. Butler led the Warriors with 31 points.
blurbs: ⬆️ Oso Ighodaro (PHX) played 28 min (season avg: 17). 2 pts, 13 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: Luka Doncic had 45 points, 14 assists and 11 rebounds in his fifth triple-double of the season, and the Los Angeles Lakers used a big fourth quarter to top the Utah Jazz 143-135 on Thursday night. LeBron James had 28 points and 10 assists for the Lakers, who outscored the Jazz 41-29 in the fourth quarter.
blurbs: 📋 Jaxson Hayes (LAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 16 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: PORTLAND, Ore. DeRozan led Sacramento with 33 points, with 22 of the points coming in the fourth quarter and overtime.
blurbs: 📋 Maxime Raynaud (SAC) made just his 5th start this season. 29 pts, 11 reb.
⬆️ Keon Ellis (SAC) played 32 min (season avg: 17). 10 pts, 4 reb, 3 ast.
